org.hazelwire.gui
Class GUIBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.hazelwire.gui.GUIBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.util.Observer, org.eclipse.swt.events.ControlListener, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener
public class GUIBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer, org.eclipse.swt.events.ControlListener

This class is responsible for drawing the VM generation GUI. It consists of a large method to draw the entire GUI and a collection of smaller methods to update parts of it. In order to be able to do this, it is a subclass of both Observer and ControlListener.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main method that starts the VM generation system by getting the GUIBuilder instance and calling the init method to add all Widgets to it.

Parameters:
args - Standard array of Strings parameter. This array is not used in our system.

getInstance

public static GUIBuilder getInstance()
This method checks whether an instance of GUIBuilder exists. Be that the case, it returns this instance. Otherwise, it calls the private constructor method, saves the newly created GUIBuilder and returns it.

Returns:
the instance of GUIBuilder.

init

public void init()
The init method first gets the ModsBookkeeper instance and adds itself as an Observer. Next, it creates a Shell, adds itself as a ControlListener, calls addGUIElements to add all necessary Widgets and displays the shell until the user closes it, or until the generation process is completed.

updateTagtree

public void updateTagtree(java.lang.String search)
This method takes a search phrase and updates the Tree of Tags, leaving only those Tags and Mods that contain the search phrase in their name or description. Entering an empty String as a search phrase, restores the tree to its original settings.

Parameters:
search - the String search phrase.

updateCombo

public void updateCombo(org.hazelwire.gui.Mod selected)
This method updates the Combo containing all Challenges in Mod selected. It shows an option for each of the Challenges in selected and by default selects the first one in the list.

Parameters:
selected - the currently selected Mod, or null, if no Mod is selected.

updatePackages

public void updatePackages(org.hazelwire.gui.Mod selected)
This method updates the Text that shows all packages belonging to the Mod selected. It shows a new package on each line and if no Mod is selected, it shows a default informational text.

Parameters:
selected - the currently selected Mod, or null, if no Mod is selected.

updateModList

public void updateModList()
This method invokes the redraw method on the list of selected Mods.

updateScoreLabels

public void updateScoreLabels()
This method updates both the labels that display the total amount of points that can be scored per Virtual Machine, with the current configurations. The total amount of points is the value of all challenges of all selected Mods.

updateChallengesTree

public void updateChallengesTree()
This method makes sure that the Tree of Challenges is updated according to the currently selected Mod. It will show all ChallengesTree if a Mod is selected and it will show an empty Tree if no Mod is selected.

updateConfig

public void updateConfig(java.lang.String key)
This method updates the Text to contain the current value of the specified configuration option.

Parameters:
key - String consisting of the name of the configuration option that needs to be updated.

updateOptions

public void updateOptions()
This method is used for drawing OptionsComposites for each of the Options the selected Mod has. No OptionsComposites are drawn when no Mod is currently selected. Finally, the GUI is redrawn to display the changes.

update

public void update(java.util.Observable obs,
                   java.lang.Object obj)
This method is called by the Observable ModsBookkeeper, whenever the collection of selected Mod or the selected Mod itself changes. This method calls updateScoreLabels, sets the name of the selected module, calls updateCombo, updateChallengesTree, updatePackages and updateOptions.

Specified by:
update in interface java.util.Observer

getTextOutput

public org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text getTextOutput()
Returns:
the large Text on the VM Generation tab

getTextFilePath

public org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text getTextFilePath()

public org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display getDisplay()

the Display
